name: Lost N' Found
description:
Help the old man uncover the secrets of the so called "Secret Society". Collect tools and clues and go "there and back" solving riddles. Use the right click to navigate the city and the left click to inspect or interact with your environment .

In case you don't know what to do next: 

I went way too big for my skills and working hours this week but I regret nothing! I only want to apologize for neglecting Audio, which is my specialty but I wanted to dedicate my time to things I'm less comfortable with! :)  

PLEASE READ: 3 tips to enjoy the game more before the post Jam fix update...

1) Use the screwdriver in all 3 pipes before returning it. 

2) At the final room, do not place more than 1 items on each pedestal. 

3) Avoid having the items selected when changing rooms. 

Those are easy to be fixed but I have to wait for the voting period to end! 

Thanks for playing! :)
